label: Voice and Movement II
description: Further development of the interconnected vocal production and movement processes for the actor. Various exercised, conditioning, and training methods are used. Prerequisite: Enrollment limited to Theatre majors only.
courseSectionInformation: Prerequisite: Enrollment limited to Theatre majors only.
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to NONE:Theatre:Theatr Fndtn-UIUC or BFA:Theatre: Acting -UIUC.
